projects.title: Smackdab
projects.description: Smackdab is a CRM mobile application that helps businesses manage leads, clients, activities, and sales pipelines efficiently, with full offline support.
projects.longDescription: Smackdab is an enterprise CRM mobile application built with Flutter and Dart. It features an offline-first sync engine, server-driven UI framework for dynamic forms and workflows, multi-device synchronization with priority queues, floating draggable recording widget, secure storage with hidden folders, and custom typeahead dropdowns for large datasets.
features: Offline-first sync engine with conflict resolution
Server-driven UI for dynamic forms and workflows
Floating draggable recording widget with waveform visualization
Secure storage system with hidden folders and transcription

projects.title: EchoScript
projects.description: A healthcare-focused app designed for doctors and patients to record or manage consultations with AI-driven transcription and note generation.
projects.longDescription: EchoScript is a healthcare consultation app built with Flutter and Dart. It allows doctors and patients to manage consultations with AI-based transcript generation, cross-platform synchronization via REST APIs, and robust audio recording with call interruption handling.
features: Meeting management module with audio recording
AI-based transcript generation with exportable notes
Call interruption handling for uninterrupted recordings

projects.title: iKnowa
projects.description: iKnowa is a property management platform enabling owners and contractors to manage projects, costs, and compliance efficiently, with data-driven insights.
projects.longDescription: iKnowa is a property management app built with Flutter and Dart. Features include auto-saving estimation forms, material costing, phase management workflows, and estimation summary modules for accurate project budgets and progress overview.
features: Material costing and phase management workflows
Estimation summary module for project cost overview

projects.title: Status Saver
projects.description: A utility app enabling users to download and manage WhatsApp statuses (images/videos) directly in their gallery.
projects.longDescription: Status Saver is an Android app built with Java and Material UI. It allows users to save, share, delete, and repost WhatsApp statuses efficiently using Media APIs for storage and retrieval.
features: Seamless save, share, delete, and repost options

projects.title: Picture Point
projects.description: A wallpaper customization app offering HD wallpapers across 25+ categories with offline access and personalization features.
projects.longDescription: Picture Point is an Android app built with Java, Material UI, and Media APIs. Features include HD wallpapers across multiple categories, offline access, search/download/sharing functionality, and Pixel API integration for high-quality visuals.
features: Pixel API integration for high-quality visuals

projects.title: Rideo
projects.description: Rideo is a ride-sharing mobile application enabling users to book, track, and manage rides with real-time updates.
projects.longDescription: Rideo app is built on Android with Firebase backend. It allows users to book rides, track them in real-time, and manage ride details efficiently. Features include driver-passenger matching, authentication, and secure data storage.
